title.value: Проблемы оценки эффективности реализации продукции сельскохозяйственными предприятиями Республики Беларусь
Problems of efficiency estimation of production realization by the agricultural enterprises of the Republic of Belarus
Problems of efficiency estimation of production realization by the agricultural enterprises of the Republic of Belarus

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shcherbatyuk, S.Yu., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Techniques of the analysis of realization of production of agriculture (in particular animal husbandry production) are improved in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. The offered approach is characterized by a comprehensive approach, logic sequence. It allows carrying out an assessment of efficiency of sales of the agricultural enterprise, to show and count up reserves of its increase. It promotes finally to improvement of administrative decisions quality. Use of the given technique can be recommended to workers of economic services of the agricultural enterprise.
